**Prem Prakash Sandesh Information News Service**

Respected Guruvar **Satguru Swami Bhagat Prakash Ji Maharaj's Worship Program at Gaya Tirth** âœˆï¸ğŸš†

**18 November - Arrival at Gaya**

**19 November Morning 7 AM - Pitru Poojan on the banks of River Phalgu**

Departure from Gaya in the evening

Devotees who wish to perform **Pitru Pooja** at Gaya should reach Gaya by **18 November evening** by their **own means**.

Note - Any devotee who wishes to come to "Gaya" is kindly requested to give their **travel information before 10 November** by **calling 8989701236**.

Place of stay for all devotees in Gaya:
**Shagun Guest House
Vishnupad Road
Gaya - 823001**

Note - **Train tickets** for travel to and from Gaya can be booked **60 days prior** to the journey date, so devotees who wish to come are kindly requested to book their tickets in time and inform accordingly.
